name: Tiny Hadron Collider (mertmcgert)
description:
Tiny Hadron Collider is a simple idler for the PlayDate in which you work to generate as many muons as possible by manually cranking the particle accelerator as well as buying automated upgrades.

This was a introductory exploration into both Lua programming as well as the PlayDate SDK.

How To Play

On the PlayDate
Download the zip, and follow the instructions here to sideload the game onto your PlayDate console

On Windows/Mac

Download the zip file, unzip it, and open the TinyHadronColliderV2.pdx directory using the PlayDate Simulator, available for free in the PlayDate SDK

Get The Source

All the source for Tiny Hadron Collider is available on my GitHub, along with instructions on how to build and modify the code. Feel free to re-use any of the code in your own projects!
